Generative AI in the Legal Profession

Generative AI has great potential as a copilot to enhance lawyers' efficacy and efficiency, enabling them to focus on more complex and higher-value legal work. This guide shares good practices for prompt engineering, helping lawyers achieve better results when using generative AI tools.
